data.title: Bobby Brown News, Pictures, and Videos
data.meta_description: Get the latest and most updated news, videos, and photo galleries about Bobby Brown
data.text:
Bobby Brown Reflects on What His Late Children Would Think About His Time on The Masked Singer

Bobby Brown, who was revealed as The Crab on The Masked Singer's April 21 episode, tells E! News exclusively how the late Bobby Jr. and Bobbi Kristina would react to him competing on the show.

Why Bobby Brown Says He Feels "Guilty" for Playing a Part in Son Bobby Jr.'s Death

Bobby Brown stopped by Red Table Talk on April 14, where he explained why he feels "guilty" for playing a part in the November 2020 death of son Bobby Brown Jr.

Bobby Brown Demands Justice After Losing Son to "Out of Control" Opioid Crisis

Bobby Brown Jr.'s parents have called for action after the aspiring musician died from an accidental overdose. Scroll to read the New Edition artist's message to "those supplying this lethal drug."

Bobby Brown Jr.'s Cause of Death Revealed

Bobby Brown Jr., the son of singer Bobby Brown, passed away at the age of 28 on Nov. 18. Four months later, E! News has confirmed what led to the aspiring musician's death.

The Many Heartbreaks Bobby Brown Has Endured in His Life

The Grammy winner's personal blows include the deaths of two of his children in six years, the demise of his marriage to Whitney Houston and their shared struggles with drug abuse.

Bobby Brown Breaks His Silence on Son Bobby Jr.'s Death

Musician Bobby Brown has spoken out after the sudden passing of Bobby Brown Jr., his second child to die in the past five years.

Bobby Brown Jr.'s Girlfriend Says She Lost Her "Soul Mate" After His Death

Following the untimely dead of Bobby Brown's 28-year-old son, Bobby Jr., the late singer's purported girlfriend has spoken out about the sudden loss.

Bobby Brown's Son Bobby Jr. Dead at Age 28

Five years after half-sister Bobbi Kristina Brown suddenly passed away due to an accidental drowning, Bobby Jr. has died. Details here.

Bobby Brown's Son Bobby Jr. Dead at 28

Bobby Brown's son, Bobby Jr., has died at the age of 28. His death comes five years after half-sister Bobbi Kristina Brown died in an accidental drowning.

Bobby Brown Pays Tribute to Late Daughter Bobbi Kristina

The singer honors his & Whitney Houston's daughter and shares a sign he believes he received from her five years after her death.

Bobby Brown Pays Tribute to Daughter Bobbi Kristina on the 5th Anniversary of Her Death

Bobby Brown honored his late daughter, Bobbi Kristina Brown, and shared what he believes was a sign from her on the fifth anniversary of her death.

Bobbi Kristina Brown's Ex Nick Gordon Arrested Again for Domestic Violence

Man who was found legally responsible for the death of Bobby Brown and Whitney Houston's daughter has been arrested again

Bobby Brown Doesn't Think Whitney Houston ''Died From Drugs,'' Plus More Shocking Confessions

New Edition singer also says he wants Nick Gordon to get "locked up somewhere where somebody can rape him"
